Sample code for comparing cluster schemes.


```{r}

# Prep data
vars <- names(g2.dt)[names(g2.dt) %like% "sh_"]
#vars <- names(g2.dt)[names(g2.dt) %like% "shp_"]
# Note that adding the production shares does not help the clustering
# so decided not to use
vars <- vars[-5]
vars <- c(vars, "AN05_TLU")

res <- g2.dt[, .SD, .SDcols=vars]
res <- res[!is.na(sh_HORT)]
#res <- scale(res)

summary(res)

HCPCshiny(res)

```
